experiences.title: Executive Producer
experiences.subtitle: St. Mary's University
workDescription: Produced live-stream broadcast for St. Mary's University Law School commencement to an audience of spectators /n and remote viewers
Collaborated with technical director and broadcast engineer to execute the live-streamed show according to the /n run of show and university communication department

experiences.title: Tech Assistant
